name: tin mine operation | tin concentrate | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20728/documentation

This dataset describes the production of tin concentrate in Peru. It includes the mining and beneficiation of the minerals.;The mining operations are located in Puno (Peru). The data were collected from the available information reported on the Environmental Studies and closure plans of San Rafael mine. The water emissions were analyzed based on the Environmental monitoring reports of the mining company.;The system includes energy, reagents, water consumption, air and water emissions.

The modeled system starts with the exploitation of the mineral ore in an underground mine.

This dataset includes the mining and beneficiation of mineral (2.5% Sn).  The system includes energy, reagents, water consumption, and air and water emissions. Industrial water is treated before it is discharged to the environment. Note that the water emissions are limited to what is reported onsite.
category: B:Mining and quarrying/07:Mining of metal ores/072:Mining of non-ferrous metal ores/0729:Mining of other non-ferrous metal ores

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The data was collected from the Environmental Impact Studies (2011-2014), monitoring reports (2015-2017) and other technical information (2010-2016). Therefore the time period is set to 2010-2017.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Inputs and outputs for mining and beneficiation are from a Peruvian mining company located in Puno province.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The modeled mine is an underground mine. The concentration plant has a capacity of 2,900 metric tons per day. Two concentration methods are used in the production process: gravimetric (84.21% concentrates) and direct flotation  (15.79%) with an average water consumption of 23,78 m3 per dry metric ton of ore.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: The data were collected  from the environmental studies of San Rafael mine. San Rafael is an underground operation that represents 100% of the tin concentration production in Perú (Peruvian Ministry of Mine production statistics, 2016).

exchanges.description: Calculated value based on tin anual production  reported by the Ministry of Energy and Mines (2016),
